articles.description: B cells are critical guardians of the body's metabolic balance. They are the only cells capable of producing insulin, which regulates blood sugar levels by designating dietary sugar for immediate...
articles.content: B cells are critical guardians of the body's metabolic balance. They are the only cells capable of producing insulin, which regulates blood sugar levels by designating dietary sugar for immediate use… [+4320 chars]
